card.name: Zack Pichi, Winged Dragon Admiral
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Armored Dragons and Fire Birds from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If all the revealed cards were Dragons, this creature gets "speed attacker" until the End Step ■ When this creature would be discarded during your opponent's turn, you may put it instead.

card.name: Cocco Lupia GS
card.text: ■ Guard Strike ■ Your Dragons may each cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 1 or less.

card.name: Annie Lupia
card.text: ■ Each turn, the first time one of your dragons attacks, untap it. ■ If you have a dragon, this creature gets +3000 power. ■ '''Civil Count 3''': If you have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, each of your other creatures gets "speed attacker". ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Bolshack Tail Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ '''Civil Count 3''': If you have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, this creature gets +2000 power and "double breaker". ''(A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)''

card.name: Bolshack Loren Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures or tamaseeds that costs 6 or less and destroy it. ■ '''Civil Count 3''': When you put this creature, if you don't have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or tamaseeds, destroy this creature.

card.name: Bolshack Raider, Assault Dragon/Raid Entry
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, Armored Mechraid 8. Mechraid ========================= ■ Shuffle this card into your deck. ■ Armored Mechraid 8.

card.name: Bolshack Raider, Assault Dragon/Raid Entry
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, Armored Mechraid 8. Mechraid ========================= ■ Shuffle this card into your deck. ■ Armored Mechraid 8.

card.name: Assister Coppi
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ Once per turn, your Armored may cost 1 less to use. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Fine Shoot Piyocchi/"Raging Dragon is Immortal!"
